sentences.en: A white cane sofa is sumptuously upholstered in gold taffeta and purple velvet.
sentences.cn: 白藤沙发上配有金色塔夫绸和紫色天鹅绒制成的沙发垫，显得豪华而精致。

sentences.en: Bessie, resplendent in royal blue velvet, was hovering beside the table.
sentences.cn: 贝茜身穿华丽的深蓝色天鹅绒衣服，在桌旁徘徊。

sentences.en: Freddy speaks very quietly and pads around in soft velvet slippers.
sentences.cn: 弗蕾迪说话轻声细气，穿着柔软的天鹅绒拖鞋蹑手蹑脚地四处走动。

sentences.en: I taped the base of the feather onto the velvet.
sentences.cn: 我用胶带把羽毛的根部粘在了天鹅绒上。

sentences.en: I would rather sit on a pumpkin, alone and not crowded, sitting on the seat of the velvet.
sentences.cn: 我宁愿独自坐在一只南瓜上，而不愿拥挤地坐在天鹅绒的座垫上。 缗。

sentences.en: She was arrayed in a black velvet gown.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件黑色天鹅绒长礼服。

sentences.en: She was clad in blue velvet.
sentences.cn: 她身着蓝色的天鹅绒服装。

sentences.en: She was wearing a white ruffled blouse and a blue velvet skirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件有花边的白色上衣和一条蓝色天鹅绒裙子。

sentences.en: The curtains and the coverlet of the bed were chocolate velvet.
sentences.cn: 窗帘和床罩是深棕色天鹅绒的。

sentences.en: The young couple plan to upholster their bedroom with velvet.
sentences.cn: 小俩口打算用天鹅绒装饰他们的卧室.
在天鹅绒般的美丽天空下

sentences.en: Velvet is not known for its versatility.
sentences.cn: 天鹅绒的用途并不是非常广泛。

words.tran_cn: 天鹅绒般柔软的；醇和的，可口的
绒的,绒状的,滑软的,厚实的

phrases.tran_cn: 黑天鹅绒；烈性黑啤酒和香槟的混合饮料；[俚]黑种女人
(非正式，旧)有利地位；条件优裕

trans.tran_cn: 丝绒，天鹅绒，立绒，赢得的钱
trans.tran_en: a type of expensive cloth with a soft surface on one side
